reviewText: 9/11 in Plane Site is an attempt to sway the gullible viewer into believing completely irrational theories of 9/11. It shows a lunatic named David von Kleist presenting video "evidence" that the World Trade Center was a controlled demolition, but also that the planes had missiles attached to them. Yes, you heard that right. In spite of the massive evidence that Al Qaeda on the orders of Bin Laden highjacked 4 planes and drove 3 of them into buildings causing those buildings to collapse, von Kleist asks you to believe otherwise.This video is just a symptom of a sickness. The sickness is called irrationality. Some of the afflicted deny the Holocaust, some believe we never went to the moon, some that we are being visited by aliens. All present skewed laughable evidence. Many believe JFK was killed by conspiracy and their evidence is Oliver Stone's movie. Some believe the bible is literally true and their evidence is that's what they were taught.To believe this 9/11 conspiracy crap you have to overlook the evidence pointing to Al Queda, the thousands of witnesses to the events, the forensic evidence of all crash sites, the cell-phone calls, the black boxes....in short you must ignore EVERYTHING except what these cranks want you to see. And what they show is laughable. The "pod" on the plane is actually the right fairing that contains the landing gear, the flash is what happens when metal hits an object at 530mph. The extensive damage of the Pentagon's 5 rings is not shown...only the facade is. WTC7's massive damage is not shown here; von Kleist has his own explanations for all this and it doesn't gel for anyone who values rational thought. For those with an agenda, or a world view that can't accept that chaos happens in a chaotic world, you might believe this junk. For the rational, don't waste your time.Popular Mechanics has a good article that debunks these theories on their website. It's called "Debunking the 9/11 Myths".
summary: Snake Oil Salesman presents "evidence" of conspiracy

reviewText: This one is pretty good but "LOOSE CHANGE" is the best & by far the most accurate version of what really happend/or didn't happen on 9/11/2001! It is very sad to read reviews from the ignorant blind who are so sure that 9/11 was an outside job. These dangerously stubborn folks have no idea what a disservice they are performing for the soul of the united states of america. When they call us anti-american for trying to save this country from the mass manipulation/propaganda that has left us on life support. This country has been built on mass manipulation & propaganda from the very first Native american that was given a diseased blanket & told that this train was gonna take him/her to a better & more fruitful place,all the way to Jeb Bush helping his brother get elected in 2000. Truth = rational thought!so when somebody is telling the truth about something & you say they are being irrational,well my sad sad confused & close-minded ignoramis it seem you are the irrational one & more importantly your pathetic arrogance & stubborness is what is truly anti-american. Asking the unpopular questions & speaking the unpopular truth is everything that freedom stands for & even though we america have a history of manipulation & propaganda just like every other country. What sets us apart is the ever pressing stride to find out how to fix our wrongs not blindly denying them! For the last 50 years we have been SLOWLY & I mean SLOWLY progressing towards being a more intelligent & mindful people in this country,despite some of the worst that has come out or is still hidden under the covers of our government we still have made baby steps in the evolution of the human mind & THEN the Bush adminitration steps in & destroys everything that we have accomplished & begins the most rapid de-evolutionary process known to man kind. So let me ask all you anti-truth seeker's just two questions! How does it feel to be one of the fooled? How does it feel to be part of the problem? Go ahead try as hard as you can to convince yourself that your stubborn blind out look is the right one. Sleep!sleep!sleep my pretty!just sleep!

reviewText: When my wife and I first started watching this DVD, we found ourselves pulled deeply into its plot... until the TRUE nature of its production slammed us between the eyes with dull thuds. In my opinion, "In Plane Site" is nothing more than PLANE criminal.  It is an anti-American propaganda tool...nothing more.  This is a dangerous DVD made by dangerous people.  Keep away from impressionable children and adults.The host of "In Plane Site" weilds an old political trick like a cheap gun.  He starts off by getting you to agree with small, simple and easily agreeable concepts, then he stacks anti-American bull on top of more anti-American bull then adds a little hysteria and danger (all the while reminding you of the simple concepts you agreed to earlier) until he thinks he has convinced you to believing that we Americans are the root of all evil and that we staged the whole 9/11 thing.  STAY AWAY...STAY FAR AWAY!  I think AMAZON.COM should yank this DVD from their inventory.  Please forgive the typos.

reviewText: This is a response for Damon Shaw's review. How is In Plane Site anti-American? The evidence presented in the video insinuates that 9/11 was an inside job, and by implication a Bush & Co. production. The Bush administration and America are two different species. One will last eight years, the other continues after Bush leaves office.Can you tell me Damon who deactivated the Pentagon's five anti-aircraft missile batteries on 9/11 so that flight 77 had a nice unobstructed collision into the Pentagon? Can you tell me why the head of stairwell maintenance for the North Tower, William Rodriguez (and his colleagues), reported explosions going off in the sub-basements before flight 11 crashed into the North Tower (he gave this testamony to the 9/11 Commission, but the Commission saw fit not to disclose it!) Can you tell me why the 9/11 Commission let NORAD officiers tell a flagrant lie when those officers said NORAD's radar system couldn't look inside the country so they didn't see the hijacked planes! Of course NORAD tracks all filghts inside the the lower 48, that's there mission. Damon, forget Von Kleist, go into the Internet and listen/read the  actual eyewitnesses like William Rodriguez, Sibel Edmonds and the lawyer who impeached Clinton in '99, David Schippers (three FBI special agents went to Schippers six weeks before 9/11 and asked him if he could do anything to stop 9/11. The FBI special agents thought that he might be able to blow the lid on the operation. Schippers called Ashcroft several times, leaving messages. Ashcrot never called him back?)By the way Damon, Von Kleist didn't pay MSNBC's Rick Sanchez or the NYC firfighters into lying that there were bombs going off in the towers unrelated to the plane impacts. Are they anti-American too? God Bless.

reviewText: There is plenty of corruption about if 1% own 40% of wealth and the banking scandal proves it. That said it looks like the commies and the neo-nazis are out to milk doubt regarding 911. I was open-minded watching this film because blowing things up or letting them be blown up to condone war is no anomaly. It happened with how Churchill drew the french into ww2 or the Luisiana or Pearl Harbour. So makes sense to fake/ allow an act of terror to condone Bush's war mongering and the Patriot's Act with all its snooping , which is happening faster than it's being regulated, which is bad news if used nefariously.This DvD cites Christopher Bolen. Even if his facts are pure as the driven snow,  he himself is a writer for American Free Press which affiliated and has same address as the Barnes Review, which is a neo-nazi organisation. I have heard enough. Go find untainted sources even if its all true but more than likely alot of people are too impressed to dig into whose making this film.What I have found from cross-examining a civil engineer is that the pentagon had been recently re-enforced and a plane would disintegrate on impact. The twin towers did not meet construction codes when built. Nor bld7. This has been common knowlege for years among engineers/architects which is why you dont see them coming forward in droves? The most recent theory is an article in Popular Science from Norway that molten aluminium and water (from the sprinklers)  does detonate.I dont know the answers but the conspiracy is who was on board in the making of this film to plant a bomb of their own or the others out there just milking doubt. How into propaganda are they for their particular political leanings.? Thank you decomcracy is not about propaganda ; that's for sheep.

reviewText: Exellent narration with some very insightful comments and disturbing visuals (and audio of Bush II answering a question about 9-1-1 as if he witnessed a fender bender in a supermarket parking lot). The whole drive of the DVD is the Host (Dave Vonkliest) reciting composition on the subject.Most interesting observations: Hosts' bewilderment over the size of the "hole" in the Pentagon; and what he sees as incendiery devices attached to the planes which hit the two buildings in New York.Weakest suppositions: that they were "cargo" planes because two observers' say they could not see windows / it was not commercial; no comment on the cellphone calls from planes to ground. Also, what about the video of Bin Laden saying to his thug buddies that he was happy tht the buildings came down..although it was planned to have only the tops be destroyed.We ask if these were "red flags"? (as distressing as it is to even ask such a question). We also ask, at the risk of being called "Conspiracy Nuts", if Bin Laden was actually some kind of "patsy", to justify the pre-emptive initiative in Iraq.
Title: N/A

reviewText: VonKleist makes a very strong case against the official government and controlled mass media version of 9/11.  He has his own special emphases and particular areas of interest, but also gives a good general overview of some of the most salient falsehoods, absurdities, and weaknesses in the official story.But what is especially valuable to me about this film are the several clips from Oklahoma television stations on the day of the 1995 OKC Bombing that vonKleist shows towards the end of his film, which he had referred to earlier in the film, as I recall, by saying:  "They're doing it to us again."  Exactly.(Also very highly recommended is the great film BEYOND TREASON produced by Dave vonKleist's co-host at the PowerHour, Joyce Riley.)
summary: My Third Favorite Of The 9/11 Films In A Field of Twenty Or So
Title: N/A

reviewText: ...9/11 was the greatest Deception ever carried out by the US Govt. and its many-tentacled security services.I came to this DVD after watching the controversial DVD Loose Change, and having seen both, it was hard to avoid the conclusion that 9/11 was a carefully orchestrated attack on the American people, by its own leaders.One quick tip of the hat to Jim McBain... It's true, the very obsessive secrecy and the we're-above-the-Law behavior of the security services, and the dehumanizing way they treat the taxpayers who pay their wages, tends to create a climate for Conspiracy Theory, even without examining the details.The focus on the Pentagon '757 crash' is based largely on the tiny initial 12/16-foot impact zone, the total absence of any credible wreckage, and the apparent presence of an engine from a military A-3 jet, rather than the large, twin Rolls Royce 757 engines which should have survived a crash of any type, and temperatures of virtually any magnitude.If the wreckage really was there, and there really was a 75ft impact zone, wouldn't it have been helpful to explain things at the time? Likewise with Flight 93... As for those 'eye witnesses' who claim to have seen an airliner rather than 'something else'... one guy didn't just see an airliner, he saw a 757 and added, just so we didn't have any doubts, y'all, "American Airlines"Yeah...Re: the Twin Towers, given the firefighters' 9/11 communications and subsequent interviews alone, we see a very clear picture of an exaggerated Government scenario of the 'inferno' on the upper floors - contradicted by Fire Chief Palmer's on-the-spot technical assessment from the 78th Floor - in which he considered that the fire could be put out 'with two lines'. If that floor was manageable, maybe the inferno wasn't quite all we have been led to believe.Having now had some time to process the information, I still find myself agreeing with other reviewers, that this may have been a black ops action, and that the real-time command and control used prior to and after the buildings were hit by unmanned, drone aircraft, (rather than 'real hijacked airliners') was so sophisticated that the carefully positioned charges brought the buildings down in a textbook controlled demolition fashion, a full 24 hours before a 'real collapse' due to fire damage would even have been a remote possibility.The Twin Towers were 'over-engineered' to the extent that they were designed to comfortably and safely withstand a direct hit by a Boeing 707, and while a 757 is bigger and carries more fuel, there is no reason whatsoever to believe that the buldings would have collapsed AT ANY POINT, even given a hit by a larger aircraft - let alone that they would collapse so relatively rapidly. Nothing about the rapid and total collapse makes any sense whatsoever.If the Conspiracy theorists are correct, this was wholesale murder, and it seems quite likley that the twofold objective was financial gain - insurance, stocks and shares etc., and a justification for The Patriot Act, after which Bush had carte blanche 'to insidiously subvert the very democracy that he claims to be trying to protect'. Going after terrorists is one thing, but the extra powers are clearly being used in a broader arc. Besides, the security services still don't seem to know exactly who all of the hijackers were - as a number of the ones identified are provably still alive.As Joseph Goebbels, the Nazi propaganda minister said, "The bigger the lie, the more they believe it."The nonsensical explanation of Flight 93 being vaporized during the crash, and the Pentagon plane meeting a similar fate, are perhaps the most outrageous aspects of the whole 9/11 'big lie'. Planes that size just don't get vaporized during crashes. Ever.Please watch In Plane Site, and watch Loose Change (they make a mistake about a B-52 crashing into the Empire State Building - it was actually a B-25, but it's still excellent) and make up your own mind.As I said, if even ten percent of this is true, 9/11 was the biggest outrage ever inflicted on the American people.
summary: If even ten percent of this is true...
